ISSUE.TITLE: Default Clean theme has issues with Magnific Popup
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Nop version: 3.70 I know this issue when using Magnific Popup zoom effect for product gallery. It's not that noticeable without zoom effect. When popup all content will jump a bit to right, issue with Magnific Popup can be found here: https://github.com/dimsemenov/Magnific-Popup/issues/125 It add style="margin-right: 17px; overflow: hidden;" to <html> but in Default Clean theme css overwrite it: html {margin: 0 !important;-webkit-text-size-adjust: none;} Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/41365/default-clean-theme-has-issues-with-magnific-popup.aspx

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1334 Fixed issue with Magnific Popup for RTL
